title: Stacktrace
description: A stacktrace frame, contains various bits (most optional) describing the context of the frame

abs_path.description: The absolute path of the file involved in the stack frame

context_line.description: The line of code part of the stack frame

filename.description: The relative filename of the code involved in the stack frame, used e.g. to do error checksumming

function.description: The function involved in the stack frame

lineno.description: The line number of code part of the stack frame, used e.g. to do error checksumming

module.description: The module to which frame belongs to

post_context.description: The lines of code after the stack frame

pre_context.description: The lines of code before the stack frame

vars.description: Local variables for this stack frame
